snippet: Michael Schumacher announced his second retirement from racing, and many people think his comeback has been a failure. But the German driver seems to have succeeded in another way, off track.
abstract: Michael Schumacher announced his second retirement from racing, and many people think his comeback has been a failure. But the German driver seems to have succeeded in another way, off track.
